channel.title: CVE Feed for Wireshark Foundation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wireshark Foundation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4190|2024-08-03T17:16:04.250Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Large loop in the Kafka dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

item.description: Crash in the RFC 7468 dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 and 3.4.0 to 3.4.10 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
